actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-891, by Mr. McGovern.
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 10 of rule XXI.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 280.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1507.

During the course of debate, exception was taken to certain words used and a demand was made to have words taken down. Mr. Obey asked unanimous consent to withdraw the words. Without objection the words were withdrawn. The House resumed debate on H.Res. 1507.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 204 (Roll no. 657).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 213 - 208 (Roll no. 658).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7110) making supplemental appropriations for job creation and preservation, infrastructure investment, and economic and energy assistance for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7110) making supplemental appropriations for job creation and preservation, infrastructure investment, and economic and energy assistance for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009.
